snippet: Rory McIlroy, who posted a two-under 70 in the opening round of the Wells Fargo Championship, said the ability to score when his game is not at its best was important to his development.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, who posted a two-under 70 in the opening round of the Wells Fargo Championship, said the ability to score when his game is not at its best was important to his development.

headline.seo: Rory McIlroy Has His Moments, Even on an Off Day
headline.main: Even on an Off Day, McIlroy Can Still Shine
headline.print_headline: Even on an Off Day, McIlroy Can Still Shine
